alert.note: Alert for Cottonwood; Murray (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 17 at 10:04AM CDT until April 18 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River near Mitchell affecting Davison and Hanson Counties. Big Sioux River near Brookings affecting Moody and Brookings Counties. Big Sioux River below Dell Rapids affecting Minnehaha County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...South Dakota...Iowa... West Fork Des Moines River near Avoca affecting Murray and Cottonwood Counties. James River near Forestburg affecting Sanborn County. James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. Big Sioux River at Brandon affecting Lincoln, Minnehaha and Lyon Counties. Big Sioux River near Estelline affecting Hamlin and Brookings Counties. Big Sioux River at Sioux Falls I-90 affecting Minnehaha County. Big Sioux River near Bruce affecting Brookings County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in South Dakota...Iowa... Big Sioux River near Egan affecting Moody County. Big Sioux River near Richland affecting Plymouth and Union Counties. Big Sioux River at Akron affecting Plymouth and Union Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...West Fork Des Moines River near Avoca. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 1425.0 feet, the lower pasture and farm land begins flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CDT Monday the stage was 1425.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:30 AM CDT Monday was 1425.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon or evening and continue falling to 1423.6 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 1425.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu West Fork Des Moines River Avoca 1425.0 1425.0 Mon 9 am 1424. 1424. 1424. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this morning at 1100 AM CDT.
